attributes.description:
VW MASTERCAR DEALER : 80 Point Mechanical Check. AA Roadworthy Tested.  We accept trade-ins. We arrange finance. We offer value added products / Service and Warranty / Plan extensions. We deliver Nationwide. Transport fee (price dependent on distance). Selling Price advertised EXCLUDES: Dealer Service Fee of R4 542.50, Lic /Reg of R850 , Numberplates of R400.  All sales subject to balance of Factory warranty or warranty purchase.
RECONDITIONING PROCESS COMPLETED: * NB Please note that no further Recon will be done on this vehicle. *Tyre thred AA  Dekra Approved,* Touch up of chipmarks, *Polishing of small scratches, *Respray ONLY, when a panel has excessive damage (deep scratches, chipmarks and dents) *Filling of windscreen chips,*Repair of cosmetic components when needed.

EXTRA’S :
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 9 150.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 51 990.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.
